item.title: [Machine Learning] Resources for CS229 - Machine Learning
item.description: https://stanford.edu/~shervine/teaching/cs-229.html 一位使丹佛大學的 Data Science track of the Computational and Mathematical Engineering department 研究生, Shervine, 在 Machine learning 的課程中所準備的相關資料. Probabilities and Statistics refresher Linear Algebra and Calculus refresher Deep Learning cheatsheet Supervised Learning cheatsheet Unsupervised Learning cheatsheet Machine Learning tips and tricks cheatsheet https://github.com/afshinea/stanford-cs-229-machine-learning
